# Dragonbone Focus
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
This token is made from [[Dragonbone|dragonbone]], covered in intricate scrimshaw that depicts fire breathing [[Draaki|draaki]] fighting off dragons in the caverns of the Underworld. A [[Draaki|draaki]] with a *[[Dragonbone|dragonbone]] focus* increases the energy damage inflicted by their breath weapon by +1d6, its uses before requiring rest by one and the [[Draaki|draaki]] may use each of their breath weapon to either create a 5 by 30 ft.-line or a 15 ft.-cone (chosen each time they use their breath weapon, see [[Draaki Heritage]] table).
